channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Activist Elliott takes a stake in Aspen Technology and pushes back on an offer from Emerson
item.description: Elliott Investment Management has a $1.5 billion stake in Aspen Technology, and the activist disagrees with a tender offer from Emerson Electric.

item.title: My dying cousin ‘fell in love’ with his hospice nurse after 4 months. She inherited his entire estate. What can I do?
item.description: “‘He wasn’t married and didn’t ever have children.”

item.title: Buy these top stock picks coming out of earnings, Morgan Stanley says
item.description: Morgan Stanley named its favorite stocks to buy as earnings season winds down.

item.title: ‘Why am I so afraid to retire?’ I’m 60 and lost $1.2 million in a divorce. Can I rebuild my life?
item.description: “If the rule of 4% is applied, I could use savings and the proceeds from my house sale to buy a condo, and at 62 draw $110,000 per year.”

item.title: Federal jobs went from reliable to risky overnight. Here’s where Americans can find stable work now — and in the future.
item.description: No job is disruption-proof, but these industries are projected to grow over the next decade.

item.title: Mortgage rates are falling. Here’s how much income you need now to buy a house for $250,000, $400,000 and $1 million.
item.description: Mortgage rates fell for the sixth week in a row, offering more financial relief to home buyers.

item.title: Earnings season is winding down, and these S&P 500 companies have hiked their dividends

item.title: ‘I’ve nothing left for retirement’: My husband and I have 9 kids and $70,000 in student debt. How do we pay it off?

item.title: State Street, Apollo team up to launch first of its kind private credit ETF
item.description: Wall Street is eager to provide access to private equity and credit to the masses, and ETFs are the obvious wrapper.
